newsitem.title: GREECE: ATHLETICS-IOC BOSS SAMARANCH CONGRATULATES ATHENS CHAMPIONSHIPS.
newsitem.headline: ATHLETICS-IOC BOSS SAMARANCH CONGRATULATES ATHENS CHAMPIONSHIPS.

text.p: International Olympic Committee President Juan Antonio Samaranch congratulated Greece on the successful organisation of the World Athletics Championships in Athens.

In letters made public by their offices on Wednesday, Samaranch congratulates Athens Mayor Dimitris Avramopoulos and state President Costis Stephanopoulos for the success of the 10-day event that finished on Sunday.
"Your city can be proud for the excellent organisation of the championships," Samaranch writes in his letter to Avramopoulos. --Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
